content.description: The following question is based on an excerpt of music that will be played.
content.question: The tempo of this excerpt is very slow. It is in common time with an eighth-note pulse, so each measure sounds eight pulses long. The chord on the downbeat of measure 3 is a

unit.text: 3: Music Fundamentals III - Triads and Seventh Chords

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
